claim: Virtual camera system are used in video games.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 3D video games , a virtual camera system aims at controlling a camera or a set of cameras to display a view of a 3D virtual world .

claim: Virtual camera system are used in video games.
premise_source_doc_sentence: As opposed to film makers , virtual camera system creators have to deal with a world that is interactive and unpredictable .

claim: Virtual camera system are used in video games.
premise_source_doc_sentence: A key point of a virtual studio is that the real camera can move in 3D space , while the image of the virtual camera is being rendered in real-time from the same perspective , therefore , this virtual scene has to adapt at any time to the camera settings  (  zoom , pan , angle , traveling , etc.  )  .

claim: Virtual camera system are used in video games.
premise_source_doc_sentence: This is almost impossible with conventional slow motion , as the physical camera would have to move impossibly fast ; the concept implies that only a `` virtual camera '' , often illustrated within the confines of a computer-generated environment such as a virtual world or virtual reality , would be capable of `` filming '' bullet-time types of moments .

claim: Virtual camera system are used in video games.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Camera systems are used in videogames where their purpose is to show the action at the best possible angle ; more generally , they are used in 3D virtual worlds when a third person view is required .
